{{Disambig-two|the dungeons under [[Barad-dûr]]|Black Pit (Moria)|[[Moria]]}}

The '''Black Pits''' were dungeons of torment located beneath the tower of [[Barad-dûr]].<ref name=index>{{HM|UI}}, p. 603</ref>

== History ==
Between the years {{TA|3009}} and {{TA|3017}} of the [[Third Age]],<ref name=appendix>{{App|TA}}</ref> [[Gollum]] was held captive in the Black Pits, only being taken out to be interrogated.<ref name=past>{{FR|Shadow}}</ref> It is possible that he was interrogated by the [[Questioner]]<ref name=question>{{TT|Uruk}}</ref>.<ref>{{webcite|author=Mark Fisher|articleurl=https://www.glyphweb.com/arda/q/questioner.html|articlename=The Encyclopedia of Arda - The Questioner|dated=3 June 2024|website=EoA|accessed=}}</ref> Gollum was released from the Black Pits only after he revealed the information that "[[Bilbo Baggins|Baggins]]" from "[[The Shire|Shire]]" held the [[One Ring]].<ref name=past/>

On [[14 March]] of the year {{TA|3019}}, the Captain of the [[Tower of Cirith Ungol]], [[Shagrat]], cursed "that filthy rebel [[Gorbag]]" to the Black Pits after a [[Battle of Cirith Ungol|skirmish]] broke out between his [[Orcs]] and Gorbag's company from [[Minas Morgul]].<ref name="asdf">{{RK|VI1}}, p. 905</ref>

When Shagrat's underling, [[Snaga (orc of Mordor)|Snaga]], informed him that he was not willing to report the happenings in the Tower to [[Sauron]] at [[Barad-dûr]], Shagrat told him that they both would "be for the Black Pits" if such news would not get through to Sauron.<ref name="asdf" />

== Portrayal in adaptations ==
'''[[2020]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'':'''
:In the Stout-axe introduction storyline, players begin as a prisoner in the Black Pits trying to break out of [[Mordor]].<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=https://lotro-wiki.com/wiki/Barad-dûr,_T.A._3017|articlename=Barad-dûr, T.A. 3017|dated=4 December 2021|website=[https://lotro-wiki.com lotro-wiki.com]|accessed=}}</ref> After the [[Downfall of Barad-dûr]], the Black Pits<ref> {{webcite|author=|articleurl=https://lotro-wiki.com/wiki/Dungeons_of_Barad-dûr|articlename=Dungeons of Barad-dûr|dated=20 August 2018|website=[https://lotro-wiki.com lotro-wiki.com]|accessed=}}</ref> and the abyss Mordath<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=https://lotro-wiki.com/wiki/Mordath|articlename=Mordath|dated=24 June 2018|website=[https://lotro-wiki.com lotro-wiki.com]|accessed=}}</ref> beneath them were all that remained of the tower.

'''[[2023]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: Gollum]]'':'''
:During the opening chapters of the game, [[Gollum]] is thrown into the Black Pits after being tortured by Sauron. There are multiple locations within the Black Pits that are featured within each chapter.
